description: Article on past prohibitions against French language usage in the schools of northern Maine's St. John River Valley, the lasting impacts of these prohibitions, and recent unique efforts  to nurture and strengthen bilingualism in that region. Subtitled, "Once, French-speaking students on the Canadian border were prohibited from speaking French at school.
